### captured() {#a6134360027974f69765c931b0c22074e}

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
captured - Information about the pointer was captured by the user of use U.

Return true to stop the traversal or false to continue looking for more capturing instructions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/capturetracking-cpp/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/capturetracking-cpp">CaptureTracking.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CaptureTracking.cpp&#125;::SimpleCaptureTracker::tooManyUses ()</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
tooManyUses - The depth of traversal has breached a limit.

There may be capturing instructions that will not be passed into <a href="#a6134360027974f69765c931b0c22074e">captured()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/capturetracking-cpp/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/capturetracking-cpp">CaptureTracking.cpp</a>.
